name: Wonderland Days Sim Date
summary:
Pacthesis于2010年1月31日发行的女孩爱情模拟游戏（Otome游戏）。
该游戏改编自Lewis Carroll的著名故事《爱丽丝梦游仙境》的经典故事。

Wonderland Days Sim Date is a romantic dating simulation game for girls. Play as Alice and find love in Wonderland!

Alice falls down the rabbit hole to find... well, Wonderland! Meet the bashful rabbit, hatter, charming cat, King of Hearts and more. Be sure to find a date for the upcoming ball!

5 dateable characters, 11 different endings
